site_name: Bishops MansionsBishop's Park RoadLondonSW6 6DZ
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1 - Silver Birch - Reduce in height by 2-2.5m and shape sides by 1m.T2 - Silver Birch - Reduce all aspects of crown back to previous points of reduction.T3 -Cherry - Reduce all aspects of crown back to previous points of reduction. T4 - Holly - Lift canopy over lowered path to provide suitable clearance.T5 - Norway Maple - Tree located in neighbouring garden - Remove x 2-3 small low limbs growing towards clients property.T6 - London Plane - Pollard to last points of reduction - Tree located in neighbouring garden.T7 - Lime - Tree located in neighbouring garden - Remove or shorten x 2-3 lowest limbs growing towards clients property. T8 - Cherry - Reduce all aspects of crown back to previous points of reductionT9 - London Plane - Trees located in neighbouring property - Pollard to last points of reductionT10  - Cypress Row  - Trim hard over clients property whilst maintaining green foliage.	T11 - Bay - Trim hard all round to a tight shape; T12 - Holm Oak - Reduce and trim all round to contain.T13 - Holm Oak - Fell to ground and treat remaining stump with herbicide to prevent regrowth. T14 - Mahonia - Tree located in the front of property - Reduce to previous points.T15 - Cabbage Palm - Tree located in front of property - Reduce in height to contain - Lightly thin by removing selected limbs.T16 - Cherry - Tree located in front of property - Reduce to previous points of reduction.T17 - Lime - in neighbouring property - Reduce x 2 large Limes overhanging clients property by 3-3.5m laterally and blend into crown tops. T18 - Cypress Row - Trees located in neighbouring property - Reduce branches growing into clients property by 3-4m and shape.Ensure foliage is maintained where possible.T19 - Sycamore - Reduce height by 3m and lateral spread by 2-2.5m and shape.T20 -Cypress Row Trees located in neighbouring property - Trim back over clients property.T21 -Elder Tree located in neighbouring property - Reduce dead limb on G22 London Plan
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
